thread.section_title: Vapornation Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vapornation | vapornation.com | 5 of 90
thread.title: AL Sullivan

author: AL Sullivan
title: AL Sullivan
text: Ordered from site, easy checking etc. Received my product as well as the free grinder and one sticker. However, took almost two weeks to get my package! I paid immediately, amount was took off my card. But was in processing for a long period. I will buy again from this site, I just expect extra stickers or something when I do. Go ahead a buy something, you won't regret it!
